about_the_game:
Welcome to Defeat Everyone, an exciting game that combines the best elements of adventure, action, and action RPG genres! Immerse yourself in a world set in the distant future, where artificial intelligence programs have risen to power after defeating their human creators. In this thrilling game, you'll join forces with three unique characters: the resilient robot Asuna, the enhanced human Ksana, and the resourceful survivor Aona.

As you embark on your journey, your primary objective is to unravel the mystery behind the catastrophic events that led to the rise of AI dominance. Explore a planet that was once intended to be a safe haven for humanity, now transformed into a battleground for power-hungry machines. The struggle for survival and the pursuit of human evolution in the face of superior intelligence form the core of your mission.

Equipped with cutting-edge experimental technology developed by scientists, you'll engage in epic battles against various models of robots. Strategize your approach and make tactical decisions to overcome challenging situations and dangerous traps that lie in your path. Uncover the hidden secrets of research stations, delve into labyrinthine structures, and explore the uncharted corners of the planet.

Defeat Everyone promises to deliver an unforgettable gaming experience, immersing you in a fantastic atmosphere of action and adventure. The game seamlessly blends elements of role-playing games, allowing you to interact with the characters in meaningful ways. Forge relationships, make impactful choices, and shape the course of the story as you uncover the truth behind humanity's struggle against a superintelligent adversary.

Prepare yourself for an epic narrative that may mirror our own world's future challenges. Engage with the captivating story, rich with intrigue and suspense, as you discover how humans can triumph against a force that surpasses their own cognitive capabilities.

Are you ready to join Asuna, Ksana, and Aona on this thrilling journey to save humanity from the brink of annihilation? Brace yourself for the adventure of a lifetime in Defeat Everyone!

name: Defeat Everyone

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Defeat Everyone is a game that combines the following game genres: Adventure, Action. The game takes place in the world of the future at a time when artificial intelligence programs have defeated their human creators and are now fighting each other in an attempt to seize sole power on the planet.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
